DataCheck.Name: Linie ohne Attributobjekt
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select l.fid from WW_LINE l where not exists (select p.fid from WW_PI_SECTION p where l.fid_attr=p.fid)

DataCheck.Name: Punkt ohne Attributobjekt
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select p.fid from WW_POINT p where not exists ( select fid from ww_po_ma_manhole union all select fid from ww_po_sc_spec_constr union all select fid from ww_po_di_discharge union all select fid from ww_po_si_seepage_inst union all select fid from ww_po_se_section_p union all select fid from ww_po_ou_conveying union all select fid from ww_po_ou_leaping union all select fid from ww_po_ou_outfall_weir union all select fid from ww_po_re_restrictor union all select fid from ww_po_sw_sewage_works union all select fid from ww_po_fi_fitting)

DataCheck.Name: Haltung ohne Linienelement
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_pi_section where fid not in (select fid_attr from ww_line)

DataCheck.Name: Abwasserknoten ohne Punktelement
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from WW_PO_DI_DISCHARGE where fid not in (select fid_attr from ww_point) union all select fid from WW_PO_FI_FITTING where fid not in (select fid_attr from ww_point) union all select fid from WW_PO_MA_MANHOLE where fid not in (select fid_attr from ww_point) union all select fid from WW_PO_OU_CONVEYING where fid not in (select fid_attr from ww_point) union all select fid from WW_PO_OU_LEAPING where fid not in (select fid_attr from ww_point) union all select fid from WW_PO_OU_OUTFALL_WEIR where fid not in (select fid_attr from ww_point) union all select fid from WW_PO_RE_RESTRICTOR where fid not in (select fid_attr from ww_point) union all select fid from WW_PO_SC_SPEC_CONSTR where fid not in (select fid_attr from ww_point) union all select fid from WW_PO_SI_SEEPAGE_INST where fid not in (select fid_attr from ww_point) union all select fid from WW_PO_SW_SEWAGE_WORKS where fid not in (select fid_attr from ww_point) union all select fid from WW_PO_SE_SECTION_P where fid not in (select fid_attr from ww_point)

DataCheck.Name: Eindeutige Bauwerksnamen
DataCheck.Description: Überprüft, ob die Bezeichnung über die Bauwerke eindeutig ist (Normschacht, Spezialbauwerk, Vorfluteneinlauf, Versickerungsanlage, ARABauwerk, Haltung)
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: SELECT allFids.FID FROM --get all fids that have duplicate designations ( SELECT duplicate_manhole.FID , duplicate_manhole.designation ,1 AS datasource FROM ww_po_ma_manhole duplicate_manhole UNION ALL SELECT duplicate_spec_constr.FID ,duplicate_spec_constr.designation ,2 AS datasource FROM ww_po_sc_spec_constr duplicate_spec_constr UNION ALL SELECT duplicate_discharge.FID , duplicate_discharge.designation ,4 AS datasource FROM ww_po_di_discharge duplicate_discharge UNION ALL SELECT duplicate_seepage_inst.FID , duplicate_seepage_inst.designation ,8 AS datasource FROM ww_po_si_seepage_inst duplicate_seepage_inst UNION ALL SELECT duplicate_sewage_works.FID , duplicate_sewage_works.designation ,16 AS datasource FROM ww_po_sw_sewage_works duplicate_sewage_works UNION ALL SELECT duplicate_section.FID , duplicate_section.designation ,32 AS datasource FROM ww_pi_section duplicate_section ) allFids INNER JOIN ( SELECT duplicateNames.designation , duplicateNames.datasources FROM ( --check all designation names --and return those that are NOT unique SELECT allNames.designation , SUM(DISTINCT allNames.datasource) datasources , COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT manhole.designation , 1 datasource FROM ww_po_ma_manhole manhole UNION ALL SELECT spec_constr.designation , 2 datasource FROM ww_po_sc_spec_constr spec_constr UNION ALL SELECT discharge.designation , 4 datasource FROM ww_po_di_discharge discharge UNION ALL SELECT seepage_inst.designation , 8 datasource FROM ww_po_si_seepage_inst seepage_inst UNION ALL SELECT sewage_works.designation , 16 datasource FROM ww_po_sw_sewage_works sewage_works UNION ALL SELECT pi_section.designation , 32 datasource FROM ww_pi_section pi_section ) allNames GROUP BY allNames.designation HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ) duplicateNames ) allDuplicates ON allDuplicates.designation = allFids.designation AND BITAND(allDuplicates.datasources, allFids.datasource) = allFids.datasource

DataCheck.Name: Einzugsgebiet ohne eindeutige Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select a.fid from WW_DA_DRAIN_AREA a, WW_DA_DRAIN_AREA b where a.DESIGNATION is null or a.DESIGNATION=b.DESIGNATION and a.FID<>b.FID

DataCheck.Name: Einzugsgebiet ohne Beziehung zu Abwasserelement
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select a.fid from WW_DA_DRAIN_AREA a where a.fid_feature is null and a.fid_section is null

DataCheck.Name: Kontakt ohne Firma/Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_ad_contact where company is null

DataCheck.Name: Kontakt ohne Art
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_ad_contact where id_contact_type is null

DataCheck.Name: Kontakt Hierarchie ohne Kontakt
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_ad_contact_hierarchy where fid_contact is null

DataCheck.Name: Kontakt Hierarchie ohne Teil von
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_ad_contact_hierarchy where fid_contact_from is null

DataCheck.Name: Mehr als ein MD Datenherr
DataCheck.Description: Es darf nur ein aktiver MD Datenherr in Kontakte haben
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select a.fid from WW_AD_CONTACT a, WW_AD_CONTACT b where a.fid<>b.fid and a.is_data_owner=1 and b.is_data_owner=1 and a.active=1 and b.active=1

DataCheck.Name: Strasse ohne Name
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_ad_location where Name_number is null

DataCheck.Name: Strasse ohne Ortschaft
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_ad_location where fid_locality is null or fid_locality not in (select fid from ww_ad_locality)

DataCheck.Name: Mutation nicht vollständig
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_ad_mutation where ILI2_OID is null or ORI_OBJID is null or ORI_CLASS is null or ORI_ATTRIBUTE is null or ID_TYPE is null

DataCheck.Name: Entwässerungssystem ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_ad_drainage_system where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Gewässerschutzbereich ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_ad_wa_protect_area where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Grundwasserschutzareal ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from WW_AD_GW_PROTECT_AREA where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Grundwasserschutzzone ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from WW_AD_GW_PROTECT_ZONE where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Planungszone ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_ad_planning_area where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Versickerungsbereich ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_ad_seepage_area where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Brunnen ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_cn_fountain where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Einzelfläche ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_cn_individual_area where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Gebäude ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_cn_building where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Gebäude Ref-Punkt ohne Gebäude
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_cn_building_p where FID_BUILDING is null

DataCheck.Name: Reservoir ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_cn_reservoir where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Erhaltungsereignis-Abwbw ohne Abwasserbauwerk
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_ma_connection where fid_feature is null

DataCheck.Name: Erhaltungsereignis-Abwbw ohne Erhaltungsereignis
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_ma_connection where fid_maintenance is null

DataCheck.Name: Wartung ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_ma_maintenance where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Wartung ohne Typ
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_ma_maintenance where id_type is null

DataCheck.Name: Haltungspunkthöhe entspricht nicht der Haltungshöhen
DataCheck.Description: Haltungspunkt REF_Z wurde nicht in den Haltungshöhen gefunden
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select FID from ( SELECT p.FID, p.REF_Z, s.OUTPUT_Z, s.INPUT_Z FROM WW_PO_SE_SECTION_P p JOIN WW_PI_SECTION s ON s.FID = p.FID_SECTION) where REF_Z not in (OUTPUT_Z, INPUT_Z)

DataCheck.Name: Haltungspunkt ohne OBJ_ID
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_se_section_p where ILI2_OID is null

DataCheck.Name: Haltungspunkt ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_se_section_p where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Haltungspunkt ohne Haltung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_se_section_p where fid_section is null

DataCheck.Name: Haltungspunkt ohne Abwasserknoten
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_se_section_p where fid_feature is null

DataCheck.Name: Schacht ohne OBJ_ID
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_ma_manhole where ILI2_OID is null

DataCheck.Name: Schacht ohne eindeutige Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select m1.fid from ww_po_ma_manhole m1 where m1.fid in (select m2.fid from ww_po_ma_manhole m2 where m1.designation=m2.designation and m1.fid<>m2.fid)

DataCheck.Name: Schacht mit inkonsistenten Höhen
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_ma_manhole where Ref_Z is not null and Bottom_elevation is not null and Depth is not null and Ref_z-Depth <> Bottom_elevation or Ref_Z is not null and Bottom_elevation is not null and Ref_Z < Bottom_elevation

DataCheck.Name: Schacht Text ohne Textinhalt
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_ma_manhole_tbl where label_text is null

DataCheck.Name: Schacht Text ohne Plantyp
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_ma_manhole_tbl where id_map_type is null

DataCheck.Name: Versickerungsanlage ohne OBJ_ID
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from WW_PO_SI_SEEPAGE_INST where ILI2_OID is null

DataCheck.Name: Versickerungsanlage ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from WW_PO_SI_SEEPAGE_INST where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Versickerungsanlage mit inkonsistenten Höhen
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_si_seepage_inst where Ref_Z is not null and Bottom_elevation is not null and Depth is not null and Ref_z-Depth <> Bottom_elevation or Ref_Z is not null and Bottom_elevation is not null and Ref_Z < Bottom_elevation

DataCheck.Name: Versickerungsanlage Text ohne Textinhalt
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_si_seepage_inst_tbl where label_text is null

DataCheck.Name: Versickerungsanalge Text ohne Plantyp
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_si_seepage_inst_tbl where id_map_type is null

DataCheck.Name: Vorflutereinlauf ohne OBJ_ID
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_di_discharge where ILI2_OID is null

DataCheck.Name: Vorflutereinlauf ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_di_discharge where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Vorflutereinlauf Text ohne Textinhalt
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_di_discharge_tbl where label_text is null

DataCheck.Name: Vorflutereinlauf Text ohne Plantyp
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_di_discharge_tbl where id_map_type is null

DataCheck.Name: Spezialbauwerk ohne OBJ_ID
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_sc_spec_constr where ILI2_OID is null

DataCheck.Name: Spezialbauwerk ohne eindeutige Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select s1.fid from ww_po_sc_spec_constr s1 where s1.fid in (select s2.fid from ww_po_sc_spec_constr s2 where s1.designation=s2.designation and s1.fid<>s2.fid)

DataCheck.Name: Spezialbauwerk mit inkonsistenten Höhen
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_sc_spec_constr where Ref_Z is not null and Bottom_elevation is not null and Depth is not null and Ref_z-Depth <> Bottom_elevation or Ref_Z is not null and Bottom_elevation is not null and Ref_Z < Bottom_elevation

DataCheck.Name: Spezialbauwerk Text ohne Textinhalt
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_sc_spec_constr_tbl where label_text is null

DataCheck.Name: Spezialbauwerk Text ohne Plantyp
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_sc_spec_constr_tbl where id_map_type is null

DataCheck.Name: Haltungsverbindung ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_fi_fitting where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Haltungsverbindung ohne Typ
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_fi_fitting where id_type is null

DataCheck.Name: ARA Bauwerk ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_sw_sewage_works where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: ARA Bauwerk ohne OBJ_ID
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_sw_sewage_works where ILI2_OID is null

DataCheck.Name: ARA Bauwerk Text ohne Textinhalt
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_sw_sewage_works_tbl where label_text is null

DataCheck.Name: ARA Bauwerk Text ohne Plantyp
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_sw_sewage_works_tbl where id_map_type is null

DataCheck.Name: Überlauf ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_ou_outfall_weir where designation is null union all select fid from WW_PO_OU_CONVEYING where designation is null union all select fid from WW_PO_OU_LEAPING where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Überlauf ohne OBJ_ID
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_po_ou_outfall_weir where ili2_oid is null union all select fid from WW_PO_OU_CONVEYING where ili2_oid is null union all select fid from WW_PO_OU_LEAPING where ili2_oid is null

DataCheck.Name: Absperr-Drosselorgan ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from WW_PO_RE_RESTRICTOR where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Absperr-Drosselorgan ohne OBJ_ID
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from WW_PO_RE_RESTRICTOR where ili2_oid is null

DataCheck.Name: Haltungspunkte Bezeichnung ist identisch
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select p.fid from ww_po_se_section_p p where p.designation is not null and exists (select 1 from ww_po_se_section_p sp where sp.designation = p.designation and sp.fid <> p.fid)

DataCheck.Name: Haltung ohne OBJ_ID
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_pi_section where ILI2_OID is null

DataCheck.Name: Haltung ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_pi_section where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Haltung ohne eindeutige Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select s1.fid from ww_pi_section s1 where s1.fid in (select s2.fid from ww_pi_section s2 where s1.designation=s2.designation and s1.fid<>s2.fid)

DataCheck.Name: Haltung falschen Höhen
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_pi_section where input_Z is not null and output_Z is not null and input_Z < output_Z

DataCheck.Name: Haltung Text ohne Textinhalt
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_pi_section_tbl where label_text is null

DataCheck.Name: Haltung Text ohne Plantyp
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_pi_section_tbl where id_map_type is null

DataCheck.Name: Haltung Text ohne Beziehung zu Haltung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_pi_section_tbl where fid_parent is null or fid_parent not in (select fid from ww_pi_section)

DataCheck.Name: Rohrprofil ohne OBJ_ID
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_pi_section_profile where ILI2_OID is null

DataCheck.Name: Rohrprofil ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from WW_PI_SECTION_PROFILE where DESIGNATION is null

DataCheck.Name: Haltung Rohrlänge ungültig
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select FID from WW_PI_SECTION where SINGLE_PIPE_LENGTH not between 0 and 30000

DataCheck.Name: Haltung Spülintervall ungültig
DataCheck.Description: Invervall muss zwischen 0 und 20 Jahre sein
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select FID from WW_PI_SECTION where MAINTENANCE_PERIOD not between 0 and 20

DataCheck.Name: Haltung Länge ungültig
DataCheck.Description: Haltungslänge muss zwischen 0 und 30000 Meter sein
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from WW_PI_SECTION where PIPE_LENGTH not between 0 and 30000

DataCheck.Name: Haltungen mit mehr als 2 Haltungspunkten
DataCheck.Description: Haltung darf nur 2 Haltungspunkte zugewiesen haben
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from WW_PI_SECTION where fid in ( select fid_section from ( select fid_section, count(1) as counter from ww_po_se_section_p where fid_section is not null group by fid_section) where counter>2)

DataCheck.Name: Deckel ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_co_cover where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Deckel ohne Abwasserknoten
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_co_cover where fid_feature is null

DataCheck.Name: Deckel ohne Höhe
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_co_cover where Z is null

DataCheck.Name: Deckel ohne Geometrie
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_co_cover where GEOM is null

DataCheck.Name: Deckel Text ohne Textinhalt
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_co_cover_tbl where label_text is null

DataCheck.Name: Deckel Text ohne Deckel
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_co_cover_tbl where fid_parent is null

DataCheck.Name: Bankett ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_const_profile where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Bankett ohne Abwasserknoten
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_const_profile where fid_feature is null

DataCheck.Name: Einstiegshilfe ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_access where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Einstiegshilfe ohne Abwasserknoten
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_access where fid_feature is null

DataCheck.Name: Trockenwetterfallrohr ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_dw_downspout where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Trockenwetterfallrohr ohne Abwasserknoten
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_dw_downspout where fid_feature is null

DataCheck.Name: Trockenwetterrinne ohne Bezeichnung
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_dw_channel where designation is null

DataCheck.Name: Trockenwetterrinne ohne Abwasserknoten
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_dw_channel where fid_feature is null

DataCheck.Name: Bauwerk Detail ohne Bauwerk
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_site_detail_ca where fid_parent is null or fid_parent not in (select fid from ww_si_site)

DataCheck.Name: Bauwerk Text ohne Textinhalt
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_site_tbl where label_text is null

DataCheck.Name: Bauwerk ohne Abwasserknoten
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_site where fid_feature is null

DataCheck.Name: Bauwerk Linie ohne Bauwerk
DataCheck.DataCheckSqlStatement: select fid from ww_si_site_l where fid_parent is null or fid_parent not in (select fid from ww_si_site)
